Title: Mudbound
Writer: Virgil Williams (screenplay by), Dee Rees (screenplay by), Hillary Jordan (based on the novel by)
Actors: Jonathan Banks, Carey Mulligan, Garrett Hedlund, Jason Clarke
Plot: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 26 wins & 91 nominations.
